scripts.use:engine: sudo n install $npm_package_engines_node && npm run use:npm
scripts.perf:analyze: npm run perf:analyze:packages && npm run perf:analyze:templates
scripts.perf:analyze:packages: cd packages/ui-core && npm run build:analyze && cd ../ui-vue && npm run build:analyze && cd ../ui-svelte && npm run build:analyze
scripts.perf:analyze:templates: echo 'Building templates with bundle analysis...' && cd packages/devtools/frigg-cli/templates/react && npm install && ANALYZE=true npm run build
scripts.perf:report: echo 'Performance Report:' && cat performance-summary.txt 2>/dev/null || echo 'No performance data available. Run npm run perf:benchmark first.'
scripts.build:packages: cd packages/ui-core && npm run build && cd ../ui-vue && npm run build && cd ../ui-svelte && npm run build && cd ../ui-angular && npm run build
